member.name: T:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec
member.summary: Unsafe LZ4 codec.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.MEMORY_USAGE
member.summary: Memory usage formula : N->2^N Bytes (examples : 10 -> 1KB; 12 -> 4KB ; 16 -> 64KB; 20 -> 1MB; etc.) Increasing memory usage improves compression ratio Reduced memory usage can improve speed, due to cache effect Default value is 14, for 16KB, which nicely fits into Intel x86 L1 cache

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.NOTCOMPRESSIBLE_DETECTIONLEVEL
member.summary: Decreasing this value will make the algorithm skip faster data segments considered "incompressible" This may decrease compression ratio dramatically, but will be faster on incompressible data Increasing this value will make the algorithm search more before declaring a segment "incompressible" This could improve compression a bit, but will be slower on incompressible data The default value (6) is recommended

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.BLOCK_COPY_LIMIT
member.summary: Buffer length when Buffer.BlockCopy becomes faster than straight loop. Please note that safe implementation REQUIRES it to be greater (not even equal) than 8.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.MaximumOutputLength(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets maximum the length of the output.
member.returns: Maximum number of bytes needed for compressed buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encode a block of input with the LZ4 compression algorithm, producing compressed output.
member.remarks: Self-optimises to use 32 or 64 bit implementation depending on execution environment word size. Will use 'unsafe' implementation also, if LZ4.Portable was compiled in ReleaseUnsafe configuration (uses an INCLUDE_UNSAFE directive; recommended if at all possible, as performance is much higher).
member.param: Buffer containing data to be compressed.
Buffer to write compressed data to.
Maximum size of output to generate.
If true, use a higher-compression but slower codec variant.
member.returns: Number of bytes written to buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Decode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decode a block of input that was encoded with the LZ4 compression algorithm, producing decompressed output.
member.remarks: Self-optimises to use 32 or 64 bit implementation depending on execution environment word size. Will use 'unsafe' implementation also, if LZ4.Portable was compiled in ReleaseUnsafe configuration (uses an INCLUDE_UNSAFE directive; recommended if at all possible, as performance is much higher).
member.param: Buffer containing data to be decompressed.
Number of bytes to read for decompressing.
Buffer to write decompressed data to.
If true, length of the input block is known.
member.returns: Number of bytes written to buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.BlockCopy(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies block of memory.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.BlockFill(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Copies block of memory.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode32(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode32(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode32(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input.
member.returns: Compressed buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Decode32(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decodes the specified input.
member.param: Set it to true if output length is known.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Decode32(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decodes the specified input.
member.param: Set it to true if output length is known.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Decode32(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes the specified input.
member.returns: Decompressed buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode64(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input.
member.returns: Compressed buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Decode64(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decodes the specified input.
member.param: Set it to true if output length is known.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Decode64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decode64s the specified input.
member.param: Set it to true if output length is known.
member.returns: Number of bytes written.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Decode64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decode64s the specified input.
member.returns: Decompressed buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode32HC(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input using HC codec.
member.returns: Number of bytes written. NOTE: when output buffer is too small it returns negative value.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode32HC(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input using HC codec.
member.returns: Buffer with compressed data (NOTE: it can be bigger than input).

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode64HC(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input using HC codec.
member.returns: Number of bytes written. NOTE: when output buffer is too small it returns negative value.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Codec.Encode64HC(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes the specified input using HC codec.
member.returns: Buffer with compressed data (NOTE: it can be bigger than input).

member.name: T:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream
member.summary: Block compression stream. Allows to use LZ4 for stream compression.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._blockSize
member.summary: The block size (compression only).

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._compressionMode
member.summary: The compression mode.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._closeOnDispose
member.summary: Whether to close the inner stream when closing/disposing.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._highCompression
member.summary: The high compression flag (compression only).

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._innerStream
member.summary: The inner stream.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._buffer
member.summary: The buffer.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._bufferLength
member.summary: The buffer length (can be different than _buffer.Length).

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream._bufferOffset
member.summary: The offset in a buffer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,LZ4PCL.CompressionMode,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.NotSupported(System.String)
member.summary: Returns NotSupportedException.
member.returns: NotSupportedException

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.EndOfStream
member.summary: Returns EndOfStreamException.
member.returns: EndOfStreamException

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.TryReadVarInt(System.UInt64@)
member.summary: Tries to read variable length int.
member.returns: true if integer has been read, false if end of stream has been encountered. If end of stream has been encoutered in the middle of value is thrown.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ReadVarInt
member.summary: Reads the variable length int. Work with assumption that value is in the stream and throws exception if it isn't. If you want to check if value is in the stream use instead.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ReadBlock(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the block of bytes. Contrary to does not read partial data if possible. If there is no data (yet) it waits.
member.returns: Number of bytes read.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.WriteVarInt(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Writes the variable length integer.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.FlushCurrentChunk
member.summary: Flushes current chunk.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.AcquireNextChunk
member.summary: Reads the next chunk from stream.
member.returns: true if next has been read, or false if it is legitimate end of file. Throws if end of stream was unexpected.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.Flush
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an Int32, or -1 if at the end of the stream.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the position within the current stream.
member.param: A byte offset relative to the parameter.
A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
member.returns: The new position within the current stream.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the length of the current stream.
member.param: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
member.param: The byte to write to the stream.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies bytes from to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.name: M:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.CanRead
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
member.returns: true if the stream supports reading; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.CanSeek
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
member.returns: true if the stream supports seeking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.CanWrite
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
member.returns: true if the stream supports writing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.Length
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the length in bytes of the stream.
member.returns: A long value representing the length of the stream in bytes.

member.name: P:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.Position
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the position within the current stream.
member.returns: The current position within the stream.

member.name: T:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags
member.summary: Flags of a chunk. Please note, this

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.Compressed
member.summary: Set if chunk is compressed.

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.HighCompression
member.summary: Set if high compression has been selected (does not affect decoder, but might be useful when rewriting)

member.name: F:LZ4PCL.LZ4Stream.ChunkFlags.Passes
member.summary: 3 bits for number of passes. Currently only 1 pass (value 0) is supported.
